Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 74th/Racine
ShortDescription: Westbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th and Loomis: due to, street blockage near 74th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th and Loomis: due to, street blockage near 74th/Racine.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with delays at Fullerton due to police department activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with delays at Fullerton due to police department activity.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
